text.headline: Data Analyst/Data Scientist
text.text: Applying my analytical skills and knowledge to various projects and work experiences, such as creating dashboards and reports on Sales, HRM, Inventory, and IT. Furthermore, I also applied machine learning (ANN, NLP, ...) into my workflow of cleaning and analyzing competitors, and import cost optimization in BA DINH FOODSTUFF.

text.headline: Teaching Assistant Tam Chi Tai Centre, Ha Noi, Hai Ba Trung
text.text: Assisted teachers in teaching, managed students, advised parents and students (in English, Mathematics, and Physics). Helped students master learning concepts through one-on-one and group tutoring.

text.headline: Web Developer Coin98vn
text.text: Developed a website both frontend and backend. Frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Backend using Django.

text.headline: Data Analyst
text.text: Utilized SQL to retrieve data from the data warehouse and employed Power BI to generate visual representations, including control charts and trend graphs, for sales and cost structure reports on a monthly and quarterly basis. â€¢ Created reports on product defects, and collaborated with quality control teams and production managers to optimize cost structures, contributing to enhanced product quality and increased company profits

text.headline: Data Science Course: The complete bootcamp 2024
Portfolio Optimization and Management
text.text: Overview and evaluation of the investment performance of the VCBF-BCF stock fund, comparing the fund's investment performance with the VN100 index and with the group's optimized investment portfolio.

text.headline: Fintech ATTACKER 2023
text.text: A project using some machine learning tools for fraud detection in banking credit transactions. Our team and me ended as the first runner up in this competition.
